channel.title: Certius || Development
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://img846.imageshack.us/img846/7352/banner2ga.png[/img][/CENTER]
[b][size=18pt]Goals[/size][/b]
[ul][*]Great Stability [*]No Glitches/Bugs/Memory Leaks [*]Much Bosses [*]Great Economy [*]Quests (2-4)[/ul]
[hr] [b][size=18pt]Update Log[/size][/b] [CODE] DD/MM/YY name: Description
_________________________________________________________________ 29/12/11 Artem & Dylan: Project Started 29/12/11 Artem: Got Client connect to the server 100% 29/12/11 Artem: Editted the LoginScreen 29/12/11 Artem: Deleted All Custom Animations 29/12/11 Dylan: Clipped Npc And Player Following 29/12/11 Dylan: Clipped Npc Random Walking And Walking home 29/12/11 Dylan: Clipped Combat 29/12/11 Dylan: Cleaned Out Source And Fixed All Warnings In Eclipse 29/12/11 Artem: Added Client sided Wheel scrolling 30/12/11 Dylan: Added Running Engergy, Credits: Russian 30/12/11 Dylan: Added Hyperions Game Enginer And RS2 server 30/12/11 Dylan: Testing: Server Held 50 w/o lag, havent tested more yet 30/12/11 Dylan: Added Cycle Based Events, Cleaned Process 30/12/11 Artem: Added All 474 Data (No Maps) 31/12/11 Artem: Got 4 Interface (Tabs) 31/12/11 Artem: Cleanup Client 31/12/11 Dylan: Added Great running % 31/12/11 Dylan: Added All Skillcapes Emotes 31/12/11 Dylan: Added Troll Stronghold 31/12/11 Artem & Dylan: Fixed all Dupes Known [/CODE] [hr] [b][size=18pt]Media[/size][/b] [IMG]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/120/loginwe.png[/img] [B]474 Data[/B] [IMG]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/825/npct.png[/img] [B]Troll Stronghold[/B] [IMG]http://img267.imageshack.us/img267/4067/troll1e.png[/img] [IMG]http://img819.imageshack.us/img819/8977/troll2v.png[/img] [IMG]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/6921/troll3y.png[/img] [IMG]http://img839.imageshack.us/img839/4764/troll4p.png[/img] [B]Home Teleport[/B] [IMG]http://img196.imageshack.us/img196/5930/teleportc.png[/img]

item.title: Certius || Development
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:4, topic:427562”]could prob find 10 diff threads by you that were made in 3 months…

cool just dont give up and make a new thread -.-[/quote]
I think i will keep with this one. I am planning to host it so i dont think i will quit this one…

Thanks guys for Support. We will need it.
Edit: All Dupes known Fixed.

Read full topic
